com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.syntax

Class MediaPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.syntax.MediaPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin

    public final class MediaPlugin
extends Object
implements Plugin
    Refines media query at-rules (@media).

    In custom refiner plugins, you can reuse the logic from this class to parse declarations with the delegateRefinement(AtRule, Grammar, Broadcaster) method.

    See Also:
    MediaQueryList, MediaQueryListParser

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      MediaPlugin()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MediaPlugin

        public MediaPlugin()

    • Method Detail

      • refine

        public void refine(AtRule rule,
                   Grammar grammar,
                   Broadcaster broadcaster)
        Refines MediaQuerys.

        If refinement is successful the new AtRuleExpression and AtRuleBlock will be broadcasted via the given Broadcaster.

        Parameters:
        rule - The at-rule.
        grammar - The grammar.
        broadcaster - The broadcaster.

      • delegateRefinement

        public static void delegateRefinement(AtRule atRule,
                                      Grammar grammar,
                                      Broadcaster broadcaster)
        A convenience method to delegate refinement of an AtRule to this class.

        This is mainly used by Refine subscription methods.

        If refinement is successful the new AtRuleExpression and AtRuleBlock will be broadcasted via the given Broadcaster.

        Parameters:
        atRule - The AtRule.
        grammar - The grammar.
        broadcaster - The broadcaster.
